examples.text: for hundreds of years the most dreaded diseases were leprosy and lockjaw

crossReferenceMarkers: The technical medical term is trismus
definitions: spasm of the jaw muscles, causing the mouth to remain tightly closed, typically as a symptom of tetanus.

examples.text: if your child develops lockjaw—particularly after sustaining a wound—seek medical attention right away
I laughed until I got lockjaw

definitions: an accent associated with the upper class of the northeastern US, characterized by a supposed lack of movement of the mouth and jaw

examples.text: he disdained the preppy men with lockjaw accents who populated Nantucket during the summer

shortDefinitions: accent associated with upper class of north-eastern US
